00055 const bool Utils::onScreen(RenderTexture* const tex, const hgeVector& center, const double& radius)
00056 {
00057     if (tex->getCamera() != NULL)
00058     {
00059         Camera* cam = tex->getCamera();
00060         if (cam->getLeft(tex) > (center.x + radius) || cam->getRight(tex) < (center.x - radius) ||
00061             cam->getTop(tex) < (center.y - radius) || cam->getBottom(tex) > (center.y + radius))
00062             return false;
00063         else
00064             return true;
00065     }
00066     return false;
00067 }
00068 
00069 const bool Utils::onScreen(const hgeVector& center, const double& radius)
00070 {
00071     Camera* cam = SceneManager::get()->getCamera();
00072     if (cam->getLeft() > (center.x + radius) || cam->getRight() < (center.x - radius) ||
00073         cam->getTop() < (center.y - radius) || cam->getBottom() > (center.y + radius))
00074         return false;
00075     else
00076         return true;
00077 }

00079 const double Utils::distanceBetween(const hgeVector& p1, const hgeVector& p2)
00080 {
00081     return (p1 - p2).Length();
00082 }
00083 
00084 const double Utils::angleBetween(const hgeVector& p1, const hgeVector& p2)
00085 {
00086     double ret = atan2(p2.y - p1.y, p2.x - p1.x);
00087     if (ret + 2 * M_PI > 2 * M_PI)
00088         return ret;
00089     else
00090         return ret + 2 * M_PI;
00091 }

00093 void Utils::writeToLog(const string& text, const bool& writeToConsole)
00094 {
00095     log.open("log.txt", ios::app);
00096     log << text << "\n";
00097     log.close();
00098 
00099     if (writeToConsole)
00100         GuiManager::get()->writeToConsole(text);
00101 }

00103 void Utils::writeFormattedToLog(const string& format, const bool& writeToConsole, ...)
00104 {
00105     char buffer[2048];
00106 
00107     va_list args;
00108     va_start (args, writeToConsole);
00109 
00110     vsprintf(buffer, format.c_str(), args);
00111 
00112     va_end(args);
00113 
00114     const string tmp = buffer;
00115     writeToLog(tmp, writeToConsole);
00116 }

00118 const string Utils::formatString(const string& format, ...)
00119 {
00120     char buffer[2048];
00121 
00122     va_list args;
00123     va_start (args, format);
00124 
00125     vsprintf(buffer, format.c_str(), args);
00126 
00127     va_end(args);
00128 
00129     return string(buffer);
00130 }
